#summary list of features for the 0.2 release

== New Annotations ==
   * ListField

== New Annotations Attributes ==
   * fieldSet
   * styleName
   * enabled

== New Client Side Components ==
   * A FormPanel subclass that facilitates access to underlying fieldsets (completed in svn)
   * A FieldSet subclass that facilitates access to underlying fields (completed in svn)

== Support for nested beans ==
   * related to fieldSets
